text: Margreth Weivers (24 July 1926 - 3 February 2021) was a Swedish actress. She appeared in more than 100 movies and television shows. Her career began in 1943. She was born in Stockholm, Sweden. Weivers was known for her roles in A Swedish Love Story (1970), The Man from Majorca (1984), Det är långt till New York (1988), Lotta på Bråkmakargatan (1992), Spring of Joy (1993), Lotta flyttar hemifrån (1993), Glasblåsarns barn (1998), En häxa i familjen (2000), Jönssonligan spelar högt (2000) and The Dog Hotel (2000). Weivers died on 3 February 2021 in Stockholm, aged 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Margreth Weivers
